document.full_text: a deadly explosion at a chinese factory making ipads for apple has focused attention on lax industrial safety standards that continue to plague many chinese workers, while raising supply chain risks in the high-end electronics sector.
document.title: explosion at china ipad factory highlights lax safety
lines_and_colors: a deadly explosion at a chinese factory making ipads for apple has focused attention on lax industrial safety standards that continue to plague many chinese workers, while raising supply chain risks in the high-end electronics sector.
